mapper.select:
select
from wms_product where 1=1
and productName LIKE "%"#{pd.productname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
and brandName LIKE "%"#{pd.brandname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
and producing_area LIKE "%"#{pd.producingArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
and remark_1 LIKE "%"#{pd.remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
and luggageMail LIKE "%"#{pd.luggageMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
and( barCode_main = #{pd.barcodeMain,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR barCode_auxiliary1 = #{pd.barcodeMain,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR barCode_auxiliary2 = #{pd.barcodeMain,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR barCode_auxiliary3 = #{pd.barcodeMain,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR barCode_auxiliary4 = #{pd.barcodeMain,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

select
from wms_product where barCode_main = #{barCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR barCode_auxiliary1 = #{barCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR barCode_auxiliary2 = #{barCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR barCode_auxiliary3 = #{barCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR barCode_auxiliary4 = #{barCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
